mc.name: Storm Cauldron
mc.oracleText:
Each player may play an additional land during each of his or her turns.

Whenever a land is tapped for mana, return it to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText:
Each player may play an additional land during each of his or her turns.
Whenever a land is tapped for mana, return it to its owner's hand.

mc.name: Feroz's Ban
mc.oracleText: Creature spells cost {2} more to play.
mc.printedText: Creature spells cost {2} more to play.
mc.flavorText: Feroz is gone, but what remains is his final gift to his people: the right to be left alone.

mc.name: Creeping Mold
mc.oracleText: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.
mc.printedText: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.
mc.flavorText: Mold crept over the walls and into every crevice until the gleaming white stone strained and burst.

mc.name: Pride of Lions
mc.oracleText: You may have Pride of Lions assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.
mc.printedText: You may have Pride of Lions deal its combat damage to defending player as though it weren't blocked.
mc.flavorText: There's only one thing worse than a hungry lion--many hungry lions.

mc.name: Gang of Elk
mc.oracleText: Whenever Gang of Elk becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.
mc.printedText: Whenever Gang of Elk becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.
mc.flavorText:
"I felt the ground shake, so I hid in my tent until the earthquake passed. It passed all right, and it left hoofprints."
--Femeref explorer

mc.name: Pyrotechnics
mc.oracleText: Pyrotechnics deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players.
mc.printedText: Pyrotechnics deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players.
mc.flavorText:
"Who says lightning never strikes twice?"
--Storm shaman

mc.name: Granite Grip
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 for each Mountain you control.
mc.printedText: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 for each mountain you control.
mc.flavorText: "Let me introduce you to Rocky."

mc.name: Goblin Chariot
mc.oracleText: Haste (This creature can attack the turn it comes under your control.)
mc.printedText: Haste (This creature may attack and {T} the turn it comes under your control.)
mc.flavorText: The hardest part of his training is learning not to eat the boar.

mc.name: Balduvian Barbarians
mc.flavorText:
"From the snowy slopes of Kaelor,
To the canyons of Bandu,
We drink and fight and feast and die
As we were born to do."
--Balduvian tavern song

mc.name: Goblin Gardener
mc.oracleText: When Goblin Gardener is put into a graveyard from play, destroy target land.
mc.printedText: When Goblin Gardener is put into a graveyard from play, destroy target land.
mc.flavorText: Years of attempts have brought the goblins no closer to growing a sausage tree.

mc.name: Boil
mc.oracleText: Destroy all Islands.
mc.printedText: Destroy all islands.
mc.flavorText:
"It is a slaughter, the death of a sea. Never speak of it again."
--The Lord of Atlantis

mc.name: Goblin War Drums
mc.oracleText: Each creature you control can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.
mc.printedText: Each creature you control can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.
mc.flavorText: The goblin idea of music is to hit something with a stick.

mc.name: Pyroclasm
mc.oracleText: Pyroclasm deals 2 damage to each creature.
mc.printedText: Pyroclasm deals 2 damage to each creature.
mc.flavorText:
"When the air burns, only death breathes deep."
--Bogardan mage

mc.name: Æther Flash
mc.oracleText: Whenever a creature comes into play, Æther Flash deals 2 damage to it.
mc.printedText: Whenever a creature comes into play, Aether Flash deals 2 damage to it.
mc.flavorText: As the foul beast appeared, arcane lightning crackled around it.

mc.name: Goblin Glider
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Goblin Glider can't block.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Goblin Glider can't block.
mc.flavorText:
"What's got two arms, one wing, and no brains?"
--Ghitu riddle

mc.name: Hill Giant
mc.flavorText: Hill giants are mostly just big. Of course, that does count for a lot.

mc.name: Impatience
mc.oracleText: At the end of each player's turn, if that player didn't play a spell that turn, Impatience deals 2 damage to him or her.
mc.printedText: At the end of each player's turn, if that player didn't play a spell that turn, Impatience deals 2 damage to him or her.
mc.flavorText: "I'm going to count to three. Three."

mc.name: Mana Clash
mc.oracleText: You and target opponent each flip a coin. Mana Clash deals 1 damage to each player whose coin comes up tails. Repeat this process until both players' coins come up heads on the same flip.
mc.printedText: You and target opponent each flip a coin. Mana Clash deals 1 damage to each player whose coin comes up tails. Repeat this process until both players' coins come up heads on the same flip.

mc.name: Relentless Assault
mc.oracleText: Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.
mc.printedText: Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. You get an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase this turn.
mc.flavorText: "Mercy? Mercy is for the playground, not the battleground."

mc.name: Wildfire
mc.oracleText: Each player sacrifices four lands. Wildfire deals 4 damage to each creature.
mc.printedText: Each player sacrifices four lands. Wildfire deals 4 damage to each creature.
mc.flavorText: Fire is always at the top of the food chain, and it has a big appetite.

mc.name: Okk
mc.oracleText:
Okk can't attack unless a creature with greater power also attacks.
Okk can't block unless a creature with greater power also blocks.
mc.printedText:
Okk can't attack unless a creature with greater power also attacks.
Okk can't block unless a creature with greater power also blocks.

mc.name: Reckless Embermage
mc.oracleText: {1}{R}: Reckless Embermage deals 1 damage to target creature or player and 1 damage to itself.
mc.printedText: {1}{R}: Reckless Embermage deals 1 damage to target creature or player and 1 damage to itself.
mc.flavorText: Those who play with fire are bound to get burned.

mc.name: Shivan Dragon
mc.oracleText:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
{R}: Shivan Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{R}: Shivan Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: The undisputed master of the mountains of Shiv.

mc.name: Bedlam
mc.oracleText: Creatures can't block.
mc.printedText: Creatures can't block.
mc.flavorText: The generals were dead. The battle plans were forgotten. It was everyone for themselves.

mc.name: Crossbow Infantry
mc.oracleText: {T}: Crossbow Infantry deals 1 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
mc.printedText: {T}: Crossbow Infantry deals 1 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
mc.flavorText: Twang. You're dead.

mc.name: Sanctimony
mc.oracleText: Whenever an opponent taps a Mountain for mana, you may gain 1 life.
mc.printedText: Whenever an opponent taps a mountain for mana, you may gain 1 life.
mc.flavorText: "The peasants labor for my profit. I approve."

mc.name: Glorious Anthem
mc.oracleText: Creatures you control get +1/+1.
mc.printedText: Creatures you control get +1/+1.
mc.flavorText:
"North and South meet and angels sing.
Voices resound with a righteous ring."
--"The Ballad of the Paladins"

mc.name: Coral Merfolk
mc.flavorText: The coral merfolk delight in wrestling with their foes, skinning them alive on the razor-sharp edges of their reef.

mc.name: Vigilant Drake
mc.oracleText:
Flying

{2}{U}: Untap Vigilant Drake.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{2}{U}: Untap Vigilant Drake
mc.flavorText: It can stay aloft for weeks with little or no sleep.

mc.name: Memory Lapse
mc.oracleText: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it on top of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.
mc.printedText: Counter target spell. Put it on top of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.
mc.flavorText: "Eri phar phesta . . . um, phistor . . . er, phistara . . ."

mc.name: Ancestral Memories
mc.oracleText: Look at the top seven cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
mc.printedText: Look at the top seven cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
mc.flavorText:
"It's a poor sort of memory that only works backwards."
--Lewis Carroll,
Through the Looking Glass

mc.name: Scathe Zombies
mc.flavorText:
"They groaned, they stirred, they all uprose,
Nor spake, nor moved their eyes;
It had been strange, even in a dream,
To have seen those dead men rise."
--Samuel Taylor Coleridge,
"The Rime of the Ancient Mariner"

mc.name: Vizzerdrix
mc.flavorText: A bored wizard once created a vizzerdrix out of a bunny and a piranha. He never made that mistake again.

mc.name: Sacred Nectar
mc.oracleText: You gain 4 life.
mc.printedText: You gain 4 life.
mc.flavorText:
"For he on honey-dew hath fed,
And drunk the milk of Paradise."
--Samuel Taylor Coleridge,
"Kubla Khan"

mc.name: Monstrous Growth
mc.oracleText: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Get in touch with your inner monster.

mc.name: Giant Octopus
mc.flavorText: The only thing that flows faster than water is fear.

mc.name: Volcanic Hammer
mc.oracleText: Volcanic Hammer deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText: Volcanic Hammer deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText: Fire finds its form in the heat of the forge.
